content:
Sightglass Coffee on 7th Street is a fantastic spot! I'm happy to report that Sightglass has maintained its high standards and commitment to quality coffee since you left SF.

While they've made some minor changes to their menu and atmosphere, the core of what makes Sightglass great remains the same. Here's what you can expect:

1. **Coffee quality**: Sightglass is still dedicated to sourcing high-quality, small-batch coffee beans from top roasters. Their pour-overs and espresso drinks are still expertly crafted to bring out the unique flavors of each bean.
2. **Modern atmosphere**: The shop's modern design and aesthetic have been maintained, providing a clean and inviting space to enjoy your coffee. You'll still find the same minimalist-chic vibe that you loved.
3. **Menu updates**: Sightglass has introduced some new drinks and food items to their menu, but they've also kept many of the classic options that fans of the shop know and love. You can still expect to find a variety of pour-over options, espresso drinks, and delicious pastries.
4. **Expanded offerings**: Sightglass has expanded their offerings to include more food options, such as sandwiches and salads, to complement their coffee. They've also introduced a subscription service for regular customers.

One thing to note is that Sightglass has grown and expanded to new locations in SF and beyond. However, the 7th Street location remains one of their flagship shops, and it's still a popular spot among locals and visitors alike.

You'll be happy to know that Sightglass has maintained its commitment to quality, consistency, and customer service. When you visit, you'll likely feel right at home, and their friendly baristas will be happy to welcome you back!
